title: Internet service provider market share in Australia fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 5 number of Telecommunications Companys.
The Market share is highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
The highest Telecommunications Company Telstra has 35.3 more Market share than the lowest Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Telecommunications Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The maximum Market share 46.3 is found at Telecommunications Company Telstra and the minimum is found at Australia Other where Telecommunications Company is 11.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market share for 5 number of Telecommunications Companys.
The Market share is highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
The highest Telecommunications Company Telstra has 35.3 more Market share than the lowest Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Telecommunications Company, and Market share in each Telecommunications Company on the y axis.
Telecommunications Company Telstra has the highest Market share and Australia Other has the lowest Market share.
Second maximum Market share is found at Telecommunications Company .
There is a difference of 35.3 between the maximum Telecommunications Company Telstra and minimum Telecommunications Company Australia Other.

Telecommunications Company Telstra is higher than any other Telecommunications Companys with value 46.3, followed by , and iiNet. Down to Telecommunications Company Australia Other with the lowest value 11.0.
The lowest value 11.0 at Australia Other is almost 2.32 times smaller than the average value 19.98.
